Title: Illuminated Chapter Heading for Chapter 20 with Marginal Medallion
Medium: ink and pigments on Italian paper with a watermark of three crescents
Description: On this folio from Walters manuscript W.568, the illuminated chapter heading for chapter 20 (Surat Ta Ha) is written in a decorative New Abbasid (Broken Cursive) style in gold ink. The text is written in a large Maghribi script, with vocalization in red, green, and yellow ink.
Keywords: Koran; Qur`an; Arabic; Islamic; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Illumination; Manuscript; Maghreb; Scripture
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: African
